roles.title: CX User
roles.description: CX User newly added. The role is used as standard user role with which the user can access apps; services and explore the network.

roles.title: Purchaser
roles.description: The Purchaser role has normal access to the portal with additional right to subscribe services and apps on the marketplace.

roles.title: CX User
roles.description: CX User role will get removed. The role is used as standard user role with which the user can access apps; services and explore the network.

roles.title: Purchaser
roles.description: Purchaser role will get removed. The Purchaser role has normal access to the portal with additional right to subscribe services and apps on the marketplace.

roles.title: App Manager
roles.description: App Manager role newly added. The App Manager is able to add new app listings for the marketplace and to manage subscription requests. Also the app change process can get managed by the App Manager.

roles.title: App Developer
roles.description: App Developer role newly added. The App Developer is able to chnage a app created for app listing.

roles.title: Sales Manager
roles.description: The Sales Manager can view & manage subscription requests and activate the same.

features.title: App Management
features.description: App Management page provides the App Manager/Developer and Sales Manager an overview of owned apps. Apps can get changed/maintained and new app releases started.

features.title: App Release Process
features.description: Overview of the app release process steps and triggering a new app listing.

features.title: App Subscription Management
features.description: Management of app subscirption requests; activation and connected service overview.

roles.title: App Manager
roles.description: App Manager role is getting removed. The App Manager is able to add new app listings for the marketplace and to manage subscription requests. Also the app change process can get managed by the App Manager.

roles.title: App Developer
roles.description: App Developer role is getting removed. The App Developer is able to chnage a app created for app listing.

roles.title: Sales Manager
roles.description: Sales Manager role is getting removed. The Sales Manager can view & manage subscription requests and activate the same.

features.title: App Management
features.description: App Management Board for app status overview; app change process and deactivation will get removed.

features.title: App Release Process
features.description: App Release Process to create a new app listing requests will get removed.

features.title: App Subscription Management
features.description: App Subscription Management to view, activate and decline subscritions of owned offered marketplace apps will get removed.

roles.title: Service Manager
roles.description: Service Manager role newly added. The Service Manager is able to add new app listings for the marketplace and to manage subscription requests. Additionally the Service Manager is able to change details of the offered services or deactivate the same.

roles.title: Sales Manager
roles.description: The Sales Manager can view & manage subscription requests and activate the same.

features.title: Service Management
features.description: The Service Management board provides the Service Manager and Sales Manager an overview of owned services. Services can get changed/maintained and new service releases started.

features.title: Service Release Process
features.description: Overview of the service release process steps and triggering a new service listing.

features.title: Service Subscription Management
features.description: Management of service subscirption requests; activation and connected service overview.

roles.title: Service Manager
roles.description: Service Manager role is getting removed. The Service Manager is able to add new app listings for the marketplace and to manage subscription requests. Additionally the Service Manager is able to change details of the offered services or deactivate the same.

roles.title: Sales Manager
roles.description: Sales Manager role is getting removed. The Sales Manager can view & manage subscription requests and activate the same.

features.title: Service Management
features.description: Service Management Board for service status overview; service change process and deactivation will get removed.

features.title: Service Release Process
features.description: Service Release Process to create a new app listing requests will get removed.

features.title: Service Subscription Management
features.description: Service Subscription Management to view, activate and decline subscritions of owned offered marketplace services will get removed.
